Key Match Events: Gerardo Arteaga scored the winning goal for Mexico in the 68th minute.
Edson Álvarez suffered a potentially tournament-ending injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Edson Álvarez's injury may impact Mexico's chances in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mexico scraped out a 1-0 victory over Jamaica in their Group B opener in the Copa America.
The match ended with Mexico having 61.4% possession, 9 shots on goal, and 7 corner kicks.
